data.title: Brace Sproul - Head Of Applied AI at LangChain
data.snippet:
Contributions:26 reviews, 259 PRs, 296 pushes in 5 months

Contributions summary:Brace appears to be a full-stack developer primarily focused on implementing new features and improving the user interface of the chat application. Their contributions include creating a simple chatbot functionality, refactoring existing code, and implementing new UI components. These changes span both frontend and backend aspects of the application, from the creation of content composer components to the definition of API endpoints.

langchain-ai/langchainjs

Apr 2023 - Apr 2025

Role in this project:

Docs & API Reference Maintainer

Contributions:14 releases, 728 reviews, 1766 PRs in 1 year 11 months [...] Contributions summary:Brace's contributions primarily involved generating and updating API references for all packages within the `langchainjs` repository. They focused on generating API references for all packages, including generating API references, fixing file pathnames, and maintaining the documentation structure. The user's work significantly improved the completeness and clarity of the project documentation.

### Summary

ü§©

Rockstar

Brace Sproul is Head of Applied AI at LangChain in the San Francisco Bay Area, leading applied work on agents, orchestration frameworks, and evaluation/observability after six years in software engineering. Known as a "trace tackler" at LangChain, he focuses on observability and debugging complex agent behavior while contributing to flagship open-source projects like langchainjs, LangGraph, Open Canvas, and chat-langchain. He combines product-minded full‚Äëstack engineering with prior founder and technical lead experience to translate research prototypes into polished, production-ready tooling. Brace also consults on agent design and orchestration, helping teams operationalize LLM systems and improve evaluation workflows.

data.title: Brace Sproul | Applied AI Engineer
data.snippet:
# BRACE SPROUL

HEAD OF APPLIED AI @ LANGCHAIN

AI/ML Engineer heading LangChain's Applied AI team. Interested in agents, drones, and rockets.

## EXPERIENCE

LangChain AI

San Francisco

Head of Applied AI

March 2025 - Present

Leading LangChain's Applied AI team. Managing the development of agents, AI workflows, and fullstack AI apps.

Applied AI Engineer

October 2023 - March 2025

Maintainer of LangChain's open source AI TypeScript repositories, with millions of monthly downloads across all projects. Core engineer implementing LangChain's agentic use case projects.

Create Inc.

San Francisco

Tech Lead | Full Stack Engineer

October 2022 - October 2023

Core team member developing Create's code generation AI agent using OpenAI's GPT via LangChain. [...] ## OPEN SOURCE

data.title: How LangChain Found a Trusted Partner for Their Sandbox Needs
data.snippet:
As a leader in open‚Äësource agent development, LangChain‚Äôs bread and butter is building, orchestrating, and deploying agents seamlessly for developers and non‚Äëtechnical users alike. To advance this mission, Brace Sproul, Head of Applied AI, and his team built a cloud‚Äëhosted coding agent that runs autonomously end to end. To open-source it reliably, they needed to nail one thing: their sandbox partner. [...] And the team doesn‚Äôt stop at attentive support. They continuously evolve the platform based on LangChain‚Äôs feedback. By actively seeking input and implementing improvements quickly, Daytona keeps LangChain focused on their core projects and pushes them further ahead in the fast-moving AI space.

#### The fact that Daytona is always so engaged and responsive is one of the main reasons why we chose them. Working with them has been seamless.

Brace Sproul

Head of Applied AI at LangChain

###### 03 -- RESULT

### LangChain Spins Up 4000 Sandboxes Every Month with Daytona [...] langchain.com

langchain.com

Linkedin

Linkedin

Linkedin

Learn how the leading open-source agent engineering platform partnered with Daytona to ensure secure, instant, and persistent sandboxes for their production-ready coding agent.

#### Our mission is to be the one place developers go for all their agent needs. Daytona is the only tech partner that could support our sandbox needs and make this possible.

Brace Sproul

Head of Applied AI at LangChain

###### 01 -- CHALLENGE

### Deploying Open-Source Coding Agents Called for a Reliable Sandbox Infrastructure Partner
